name: Case One: The Key To Nowhere
name_original: Case One: The Key To Nowhere
description:
Controls: [W], [A], [S], [D], [Shift], [Esc], [Enter]

After returning to Poppy Valley from a trip to The City, Oliver finds a strange key during the Graveyard Shift at work.

The first case of abnormality Oliver encounters in Poppy Valley
